alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 9:43AM CDT until March 24 at 7:22AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Barton and Jasper. * WHEN...Until 600 PM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 943 AM CDT, gauge reports indicated that the north Fork of the Spring River near Purcell was over flood stage. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jasper, Golden City, Alba, Purcell, Nashville, Carytown, Neck City and Boston. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
